title: "The Bookish Outlook" - Playing Mental Ability Scores
itunes:title: "The Bookish Outlook" - Playing Mental Ability Scores
description:
Strap in everyone, the goofs are on their own. Today Jasper and Jeremy are talking about some of the harder to define ability scores, sharing some alternate viewpoints on how you might roleplay using your Wisdom, Intelligence & Charisma.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Strap in everyone, the goofs are on their own. Today Jasper and Jeremy are talking about some of the harder to define ability scores, sharing some alternate viewpoints on how you might roleplay using your Wisdom, Intelligence & Charisma.
